intent_template: Can you add {description} to my cart?
intent: Can you add the item that was to the left of the first item the person in the video added to their cart to my cart?
intermediate_intent: What was the item that was to the left of the first item the person in the video added to their cart to my cart?

instantiation_dict.description: the item that was to the left of the first item the person in the video added to their cart

must_include: SAMSUNG 65-Inch Class Terrace Full Sun Outdoor QLED 4K Smart TV with Alexa Built-in QN65LST9TAFXZA, 2021 Model with SAMSUNG 2020 65" & 75" The Terrace Wall Mount
